original: @ ga_/  @#/_/tshha tshhwa'i cho ga🔽@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_rten rus pa la rten nas tshhogs khyad par can bsags pa'i phyir tshha tshha

translated: The Rite of Tsatsa🔽In Sanskrit: Tsa-tsa-vidhi

original: ston te tshi ta ba ti/_bod skad du/_tshha tshhwa'i cho ga_/rje btshun ma sgrol ma la
analyzed: ston te tshi ta ba ti/_bod skad du/_tshha tshhwa'i cho ga_/rje btshun ma sgrol ma la
translated: In Tibetan: The Rite of Tsatsa🔽Homage to the noble Tara!

original: phyag 'tshhal lo/_/dang por sngags pas dngos po chos thams cad bdag med par
analyzed: phyag 'tshhal lo/_/dang por sngags pas dngos po chos thams cad bdag med par
translated: First, the mantrin meditates on the emptiness of all things, the reality of non-self,

original: stong nyid du bsgom la/_de nas stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can du yid la bya tshhad med pa'i rnal
analyzed: stong nyid du bsgom la/_de nas stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can du yid la bya tshhad med pa'i rnal
translated: and then he should bring to mind emptiness endowed with the essence of compassion, the yoga of non-apprehension.

original: 'byor du bya'o/_/_/de nas srog chags 'jim pa sbru ba dang mi gtshang ba spangs pa'i
analyzed: 'byor du bya'o/_/_/de nas srog chags 'jim pa sbru ba dang mi gtshang ba spangs pa'i
translated: Then, in a heap of clay free of living organisms and impurities,

original: 'jim pa'i tshhogs la/_dzan dang /_gla rtshi dang /_a ka ru dang /_du ru ka dang / gur gum la sogs pa'i dri zhim pos bran pa dang /_skyes bu sbyang ba bdag nyid
analyzed: 'jim pa'i tshhogs la/_dzan dang /_gla rtshi dang /_a ka ru dang /_du ru ka dang / gur gum la sogs pa'i dri zhim pos bran pa dang /_skyes bu sbyang ba bdag nyid
translated: he should mix in fragrant substances such as camphor, sandalwood, akaru, durva, and saffron, and with a pure mind he should knead the clay with his right hand.

original: 'dod pa'i lha'i gang mos kyi nga rgyal gyis/_gnas te/_sarba ka ri hum zhes pa'i🔽sngags kyis/_skyon gyi rim pa sa mi gtshang ba la sogs pa rnam par dag par bsam zhing /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i lha'i gang mos kyi nga rgyal gyis/_gnas te/_sarba ka ri hum zhes pa'i sngags kyis/_skyon gyi rim pa sa mi gtshang ba la sogs pa rnam par dag par bsam zhing /
translated: With the pride of whichever desire realm deity you prefer,🔽recite the mantra sarva karī hūṃ🔽and imagine that all the faults of the clay, such as being impure, are purified.

original: klu sarba si byin gyis rlabs pa ti hum zhes bya bas/_'jim pa'i tshhogs de dag kyang /
analyzed: klu sarba si byin gyis rlabs pa ti hum zhes bya bas/_'jim pa'i tshhogs de dag kyang /
translated: Then, with the mantra sarva siddhi phala hūṃ,🔽bless the clay, and imagine that it transforms into the nature of jewels,

original: ji ltar gser 'gyur gyi rtshi ltar/_rin po che'i rang bzhin zhin gyi/🔽tshha tshha'i cho ga🔽gser dang /_man shel dang /_pad+ma ra ga dang /_bai dur+ya dang /_in tra ni
analyzed: ji ltar gser 'gyur gyi rtshi ltar/_rin po che'i rang bzhin zhin gyi/ tshha tshha'i cho ga gser dang /_man shel dang /_pad+ma ra ga dang /_bai dur+ya dang /_in tra ni
translated: like the elixir of gold.

original: la'i rnam par bsgom mo/_/de nas klu g.yon zhi gnas dang /_g.yas lhag mthong🔽gi lag pa gnyis kyis/_'byi 'byi bya zhing brtab pa dang bzhugs su gsol ba 'byi 'byi bya zhing /
analyzed: la'i rnam par bsgom mo/_/de nas klu g.yon zhi gnas dang /_g.yas lhag mthong gi lag pa gnyis kyis/_'byi 'byi bya zhing brtab pa dang bzhugs su gsol ba 'byi 'byi bya zhing /
translated: The clay is then blessed with the mantra oṃ sarva tathāgata tsha tsha maṇḍala pūja megha samudra spharaṇa samaye hūṃ.

original: sngags 'dis byin gyis rlab par bya'o/_/om sarba ta tha ga ta tshin ta ma na ye swa ha/
analyzed: sngags 'dis byin gyis rlab par bya'o/_/om sarba ta tha ga ta tshin ta ma na ye swa ha/
translated: The clay is then blessed with the mantra oṃ sarva tathāgata tsha tsha maṇḍala pūja megha samudra spharaṇa samaye hūṃ.

original: ces bzlas shing /_rin po che skol phor yi ge kham gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i nang du
analyzed: ces bzlas shing /_rin po che skol phor yi ge kham gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i nang du
translated: Recite this and place the precious pot, which is blessed by the syllable kham,🔽within the stupa.

original: bcug la/_badzra mu 'dir ma bzhugs par don mdzod gcig pa'o/_/ces pas rdungs pa'i dus
analyzed: bcug la/_badzra mu 'dir ma bzhugs par don mdzod gcig pa'o/_/ces pas rdungs pa'i dus
translated: At the time of striking the stupa with the vajra,

original: su sems can gyi don la skul zhing /_d+harma d+ha tu ga b+ha a/_ces pas skol phor
analyzed: su sems can gyi don la skul zhing /_d+harma d+ha tu ga b+ha a/_ces pas skol phor
translated: encourage it to work for the welfare of sentient beings with the mantra:🔽vajra muḥ.🔽Then, with the mantra: dharmadhātu gabhya āḥ,🔽remove the pot from the stupa and invite the buddhas to remain there with the following mantra:

original: nas phyung la/_sngags 'dis bzhugs su gsol bar bya ste/_om na mo shri ya d+ha
analyzed: nas phyung la/_sngags 'dis bzhugs su gsol bar bya ste/_om na mo shri ya d+ha
translated: oṃ namo śrīya dharm🔽dhe |🔽sarva tathāgata hṛdaya garbha rava la |

original: d+he/_sarba ta tha ga ta/_hri da ya/_gar rbe rba la/_ya ga ga ra/_mam sa/
analyzed: d+he/_sarba ta tha ga ta/_hri da ya/_gar rbe rba la/_ya ga ga ra/_mam sa/
translated: ya ga ga ra |🔽maṃ saṃśodhaya mam |

original: a yu sam sho d+ha ya mam/_sarba pa pam/_sarba ta tha ga ta sa ma ya/_ush+ni sha/_bi ma
analyzed: a yu sam sho d+ha ya mam/_sarba pa pam/_sarba ta tha ga ta sa ma ya/_ush+ni sha/_bi ma
translated: sarva pāpaṃ sarva tathāgata samay uṣṇīṣa |🔽vi mala viśuddhe |

original: la bi shud d+he/_hum hum hum/_om bam sam rdza swa ha/_zhes pa'i brjod pas sngags las 'od byung
analyzed: la bi shud d+he/_hum hum hum/_om bam sam rdza swa ha/_zhes pa'i brjod pas sngags las 'od byung
translated: huṃ huṃ huṃ | oṃ vaṃ saṃ rāja sva hā.🔽The light that arises from the mantra strikes the offerings, and the light rays of the mantra encourage the stupa with the mantra:

original: mchod pa phog pa las sam tis sngags kyi 'od zer gyis mchod rten skul bas/_mchod rten
analyzed: mchod pa phog pa las sam tis sngags kyi 'od zer gyis mchod rten skul bas/_mchod rten

analyzed: sa 'od zer 'phros pas la sangs rgyas kyi sku nyi zer gyi rdul dang /_'dra ba bcug nas
translated: Light rays radiate from the syllable sa, and the bodies of the buddhas enter like particles of sunlight.

original: slar de ltar mnyam pa las bzhengs pa'i tshhul gyis sku rnams byung nas/_'od
analyzed: slar de ltar mnyam pa las bzhengs pa'i tshhul gyis sku rnams byung nas/_'od
translated: Then, from the equalizing of those, the bodies arise and light🔽rays radiate in twenty-five colors, which strike one’s aggregates, which

analyzed: zer kha dog nyi shu rtsha lnga 'phros pas/_'di sus kyang mi 'gal bdag gi phung po la phog

analyzed: pas rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa'i tshhogs sregs par bsam mo/_/de nas yang
translated: Think that all the hosts of concepts are burned.

analyzed: sngags 'dis kyang byar gtub sangs rgyas re res kyang /_skal ba chen po'i bar du 'gro
translated: Then, also with this mantra, one should request each of the buddhas to

analyzed: he tu pra b+ha ba/_he tun te shan ta tha ga to/_h+ya ba dad te shanya tsha yo ni ro
translated: .🔽By having superior devotion to the meaning of that, one should

analyzed: d+ha e bam ba d+hi ma ha shra ma nahzhes pa'i don la lhag par mos pas 'gro ba yongs su

analyzed: gdab par bya'o/_/tshha tshhwa'i cho ga_/slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye
